name: Time to Unplug
description:
Someone broke time! Each moment is increasingly connected to every other moment. You have to stop this madness!

You must travel around, talk to people, find clues and fight baddies. But time is broken so you need to do all those things at once! And you have a limited number of lives!

The controls are explained on the ingame HELP screen - press H at any time to view help and pause the game.

A playthrough takes about 15 to 20 minutes. You can pause the game whenever you want - and you may want to as things can get a bit frenetic. It may seem utterly chaotic but if you stick with it and get the hang of the controls it'll start to seem less random.

The browser version should be fine but I've included a Windows download just in case.

Have fun!

DON'T FORGET THE HELP SCREEN!!!!!!!

Credits

Everything by me except for:

Graphics
A few bits and pieces from www.pixabay.com
Trees from https://opengameart.org

Sound
Main music is 'Fluffy Ruffles' by All Star Trio from http://freemusicarchive.org/
Ending music - https://freesound.org/people/cheesepuff/
Bells - https://freesound.org/people/acclivity/
Punch sound - https://freesound.org/people/CastIronCarousel/
Punch sound - https://freesound.org/people/Ekokubza123/
Skid sound (adapted) - https://freesound.org/people/musicmasta1/
Crash sound (adapted) - https://freesound.org/people/DieselsiselMedia/
Ratchet sound (adapted) - https://freesound.org/people/cmusounddesign/
